name: CodeClicker
description:
An incremental clicker game made for the 1-Bit Clicker jam.

Poke your programmer to get him to write more lines of code. When he's written enough lines, they'll be converted into modules. Then spend modules on upgrades to annoy him some more. Sometimes, spending modules on upgrades will cause bugs, which can be resolved by spending more modules on fixing them.

Made with Javascript and HTML Canvas using PIXI.js.

Font used is VT323 by Peter Hull (loaded from Google fonts).

Sound effects generated using ChipTone.

Art by PK :D

Code by Cindy :)
